items.question: Is Candle Master really free?
items.answer: Yes! The basic version is 100% free forever. You get 100 moves per game, 10 legendary stocks, and all 3 themes. No credit card, no tricks.

items.question: Why should I practice here instead of paper trading?
items.answer: Paper trading shows you the stock name and current news - you already know what happens. Candle Master uses 'blind trading' where you don't know the stock or time period. This forces you to actually learn chart reading, not just remember what happened to Tesla.

items.question: I'm a complete beginner. Is this for me?
items.answer: Absolutely! We built this because we lost thousands as beginners. The Candle Academy teaches patterns from scratch, and you can practice as much as you want without risking a single dollar.

items.question: What stocks can I practice with?
items.answer: 500+ legendary stocks with data from 1980-2025. You'll experience Tesla crashes, Apple rallies, Bitcoin volatility, and market crashes. Free users get 10 stocks, PRO unlocks everything.

items.question: Can I play on desktop or tablet?
items.answer: Yes! You can play on any device â€” mobile, tablet, or desktop browser. The game works best on mobile, but the tablet and desktop layout gives you a wider chart view. Just open app.candlemaster.app in your browser.

items.question: How do I cancel PRO?
items.answer: Cancel anytime from app settings. No questions, no hassle. Both monthly and yearly plans can be cancelled at any time.

meta.title: Why I Built Candle Master â€” The Story Behind the Game
meta.description: The Creator shares why Candle Master was built: a risk-free trading simulator born from real trading losses and the belief that skills matter more than signals.

hero.title: Why I Built
hero.story: I used to be that trader. The one glued to signal groups at 3 AM, chasing every breaking news headline, buying whatever the guru said to buy. And I lost money. A lot of it. Not because the market was unfair â€” but because I never actually learned to read it.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: After years in the market, I realized most new traders lose money for the exact same reasons I did.

signals.title: Signal Group Addiction
signals.description: Following other people's calls instead of learning to read the market yourself. When the guru is wrong, you lose â€” and you learn nothing.

news.title: News & Hype Trading
news.description: Making decisions based on headlines and social media buzz instead of price action and chart patterns.

noSkill.title: No Practice, Real Money
noSkill.description: Jumping into live markets without ever practicing. Like flying a plane without a single hour in a simulator.

realization.title: The
realization.description: After years of losing and learning, I realized something simple but powerful: the traders who consistently win aren't the ones with the best signals or the fastest news feed.
realization.quote: They're the ones who can look at a naked chart with basic tools â€” and make a decision. That's the real skill. Everything else is noise.

solution.title: So I Built
solution.description: I wanted to create the training tool I wish I had when I started. A place where you can make every mistake in the book â€” and learn from all of them â€” without losing a single dollar.

historical.title: Real Historical Data
historical.description: Train with actual market data from 1980-2025. No fake charts, no simulated patterns.

blind.title: Blind Trading
blind.description: You don't know the stock name or time period. Just you and the chart â€” pure skill.

fun.title: Learning Should Be Fun
fun.description: Trading education doesn't have to be boring. A game-like experience makes building real skills actually enjoyable.

closer.title: Built by a Trader,
closer.description: Candle Master is an indie passion project. No VC funding, no corporate agenda, no hidden motives. Just one creator who lost money trading and decided to build something that actually helps people learn â€” the hard way turned into the fun way.
